content: this legal text summarizes the progress of a court case in estonia the case involves a plaintiff and a defendant who are seeking the division of their joint assets the court has issued a final resolution referred to as court dec which partially settles the claim by awarding money to one party and dividing the sale amount of the coowned property between the parties the court has dismissed the plaintiffs delay claim the costs of the proceedings will be borne by the parties the court decision can be appealed within 30 days the plaintiff and defendant have submitted various claims and counterclaims regarding the division of assets loan obligations and compensation for expenses the parties have reached a real estate sale agreement and property rights agreement the plaintiff has partially withdrawn their claim and the court cannot make a judgment on the claim as it has already been satisfied the defendant disputes the plaintiffs claims regarding transfers and expenses the plaintiff is seeking reimbursement for loan payments insurance payments and late payment fees the defendant has been ordered to pay the plaintiff a principal debt amount and the court has determined the sale amount of the coowned property the costs of the proceedings will be fully borne by the defendant the judgment is based on the parties marriage and property regime of equalization the property has been sold and the remaining money has been deposited in the courts account the defendant is required to compensate the plaintiff with a specific amount the court has determined that the defendant owes the plaintiff a total amount and has already reimbursed a portion of it the court also acknowledges double payments made by the defendant the progress of the cause is explained without mentioning the names of the parties involved the court rejected the plaintiffs claim for late payment but the plaintiff believes there was a delay certain actions were taken in relation to the cause on a specific date but the details are not provided the plaintiff has accepted the defendants contribution towards joint ownership and is requesting an order to execute the judgment the costs of the proceedings will be borne by the parties according to the proportion of the satisfaction claim

metadata.cost: Each party covers own procedural costs, unspecified amounts
